tyres.Name: Safari MT
tyres.Description: A rugged mud-terrain tire designed for off-road enthusiasts seeking exceptional performance in challenging conditions with reliable on-road handling.

tyres.Name: Safari AT
tyres.Description: A versatile all-terrain tire that balances off-road capability with on-road comfort, suitable for SUVs and light trucks in various weather conditions.

tyres.Name: Edge HT (Light Truck)
tyres.Description: A highway terrain tire specifically designed for light trucks, offering a blend of comfort, longevity, and reliable performance in everyday driving conditions.

tyres.Name: Edge A/T
tyres.Description: An all-terrain tire that delivers dependable performance both on and off-road, with a durable design that withstands various driving environments.

tyres.Name: Edge Sport
tyres.Description: A performance-oriented tire designed for sports cars and sedans, offering precise handling, responsive steering, and excellent grip in both dry and wet conditions.
Features: Reduced road noise and enhanced tread life

tyres.Name: Edge Touring A/S
tyres.Description: A touring all-season tire focused on providing a comfortable ride, long tread life, and reliable traction for everyday driving in various weather conditions.

tyres.Name: Edge Touring Plus
tyres.Description: A premium touring tire that offers enhanced comfort, quieter ride, and improved tread life compared to standard touring tires, with excellent all-weather performance.
